record.field: 1. Which of the following google cloud commands is used to set scopes?
A. Google cloud compute instances set-scopes
B. Google cloud compute instances set-service-account
C. Google cloud compute service-accounts set-scopes
D. Google cloud compute service-accounts define-scopes
2. Stackdriver service that alerts when the CPU utilization of a virtual machine exceeds 80% limit?
3. Which of the below google cloud commands is used to create a custom role?
A. Google cloud project roles create
B. Google cloud iam roles create
C. Google cloud project create roles
D. Google cloud iam create roles
4. Which of the following Cloud shell commands will open a blank editor window?
5. Groping a set of metrics that arrive in a specific time into regular-sized buckets is called as?
6. When admin assigns read-only permission to a custom role. What level of privilege is given?
7. Upto ___ number of days log data will be stored in Stackdriver Logging
8. Stackdriver can be used to monitor resources where?
A. In Google Cloud Platform only
B. In Google Cloud Platform and AWS only
C. In Google Cloud Platform and on premises data centers
D. In Google Cloud Platform, AWS, and on premises data centers premises data
9. Increased flexibility: If your bandwidth requirements tend to fluctuate, using the cloud makes perfect sense.
10. Which of the following is a command line tool that is part of the Cloud SDK?
A. Yahoo search is the most popular search engine on the Web
B. Google Ad Planner is a free media planning tool that can help you identify websites your audience is likely to visit so you can make better-informed advertising decisions
C. Google AdSense is a free media planning tool that can help you identify websites your audience is likely to visit so you can make better-informed advertising decisions
12. Which of the following architectural standards is working with the cloud computing industry?
13. What is the correct formula to calculate the cost of a cloud computing deployment?
14. What type of computing technology refers to services and applications that typically run on a distributed network through virtualized resources?
15. Which one of the following cloud concepts is related to sharing and pooling the resources?
16. In which one of the following, a strategy record or Document is created respectively to the events, conditions a user may face while applying cloud computing mode.
17. Which one the following refers to the non-functional requirements like disaster recovery, security, reliability, etc.
18. Which one of the following is used to call the allocator?
19. The Parallels Desktop can be considered as the example of which of the following?
20. Which one of the following statements is not true?
A. Whenever a command begins a process, immediately the process virtual machine gets instantiated
B. Usually, the guest operating systems are mores faster in full virtualization as compared to other virtualization schemes

C. It is necessary for the full virtualization the host OS (Operating System) offers a Virtual Machine Interface for the guest operating system by which the guest operating system can access the hardware through the host VM
22. Which of the following is a measure of knowing whether the operation is inside or outside the security limits?
23. Among the following, which provides the GUI for interaction with the cloud
24. You want to schedule a cron job to send a message to a Cloud Pub/Sub topic hourly. What do you do?
A. Create a Cloud Function with a target of HTTP
B. Create a Cloud Scheduler job with a target of HTTP
C. Create a Cloud Function with a target of Cloud Pub/Sub
D. Create a Cloud Scheduler job with a target of Cloud Pub/Sub
25. You need to execute a “lift and shift '' move as few steps as possible. Which items do you need to create to accomplish this task, listed in the correct order of creation?
A. 1. Create a VPN from GCP to your corporate network. 2. Create a GCP network for the project. 3. Create the VM instances to support the application.
B. 1. Create a GCP network for the project. 2. Create a VPN from your corporate network to GCP. 3. Create the VM instances to support the application
C. 1. Create a GCP network for the project. 2. Create a VPN from GCP to your corporate network. 3. Create the VM instances to support the application
D. 1. Create a VPN from your corporate network to GCP. 2. Create a GCP network for the project. 3. Create the VM instances to support the application
26. You want to configure services to be able to perform a regular interactive query of Google AdWords data. What should you do?
A. Plan to use BigQuery. Create a BigQuery data set to hold the data.
B. Plan to use Cloud SQL. Enable Cloud SQL Transfer Data API
C. Plan to use Cloud SQL. Create a Cloud SQL Database to hold the data
D. Plan to use BigQuery. Enable BigQuery Transfer Data API
27. You want to set a notification for service spen in GCP. What do you do, and who will be notified?
A. Use the GCP Billing console Budgets section to set a billing alert. The billing admin will be notified if the alert threshold is exceeded
B. Use the GCP Billing console Budgets section to set a billing alert. The organizational admin will be notified if the alert threshold is exceeded
C. Use the GCP Organizational console Budgets section to set a billing alert. The project admin will be notified if the alert threshold is exceeded
D. Use the GCP Organizational console Budgets section to set a billing alert. The organizational admin will be notified if the alert threshold is exceeded
28. You want to build an application with conversation interpretation based on machine learning speech understanding. Which services is a best fit for this scenario?
29. Which command copies a file named test.txt to a Cloud Storage bucket named myBucket?
30. Which command do you use to connect to a running Compute Engine instance with SSH?
